meanings.definition: The part of the brain that is associated with the sense of smell.
meanings.sent1: The rhinencephalons helps us recognize different scents.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the rhinencephalons to understand how we smell things.
meanings.sent3: When the chef burnt the cookies, his rhinencephalons went on strike!
meanings.sent4: Her rhinencephalons was like a bloodhound, detecting the faintest aroma of fresh flowers.
meanings.sent5: The rhinencephalons is like a detective, sniffing out the clues of various odors.

meanings.definition: The olfactory lobes of the brain.
meanings.sent1: The rhinencephalons is responsible for our ability to smell.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can examine the rhinencephalons to check for any issues with smell.
meanings.sent3: The rhinencephalons threw a party when it detected the scent of freshly baked bread.
